ygData.subject: Re: terminating a crawl not terminating completely?
ygData.msgSnippet: Crawler stays alive after all jobs completed unless specifically terminated (Shut down Heritrix software -link) If you reload the admin console page, while

Crawler stays alive after all jobs completed
unless specifically terminated (Shut down Heritrix software -link)

If you reload the admin console page, while Heritrix is alive
although not crawling anything, the 'Used memory' value
grows. Reason is that your reload is recorded in heritrix_out.log
which grows (well, anyway, I couldn't find any other reason :)

You can return default memory values,
'Used memory' and 'Heap size', by shutting down Heritrix and
restarting it.

kk
